item.title: Implementing API Gateway Authentication With YARP
item.description: In this newsletter, we'll explore how you can implement API gateway authentication using YARP (Yet Another Reverse Proxy), a powerful and flexible reverse proxy library for .NET applications. Link to article: https://www.milanjovanovic.tech/blog/implementing-api-gateway-authentication-with-yarp
